bioconda.name: bioconductor-mosaics
bioconda.summary: MOSAiCS (MOdel-based one and two Sample Analysis and Inference for ChIP-Seq)

biotools.summary: This package provides functions for fitting MOSAiCS-HMM, an statistical framework to analyze one-sample or two-sample ChIP-seq data of transcription factor binding and histone modification.

bioschemas.name: mosaics
bioschemas.summary: This package provides functions for fitting MOSAiCS-HMM, an statistical framework to analyze one-sample or two-sample ChIP-seq data of transcription factor binding and histone modification.
